page.title: 19POPULATION IN N.BRISTOL
page.content: Areas of dense population particularly on Southmead estate.Obvious changes in population reflected by changes in school rolls. Recent closure of Greenway Secondary School & loss of teachers at Primary level due to shortage of children. Many older people. Age distribution pattern beginning to change. Larger new families moving into vacant houses.{Cyclic population-}youngsters marrying & returning to Southmead. {Westbury:}Older people owning own homes.Smaller families. More affluent community. Mainly middle class.
